phrases: Hey, little boy!
That thing I asked you to do yesterday
Right, right!
Those limited edition figurines from Akiba and the yokan from Masuya, right?
I already got them for you.
Well, well!
Are not you Mr. Competent?
Dammit, who would have thought Ms. Hana was such a callous mom!
Just you wait...
I will get back at you for this!
Chitoge!
Over here, over here!
Thanks for waiting, you two!
It is another chilly day, huh?
Where should we shop today?
Hey, you are not wearing your usual ribbon today?
Is this a make-over?
Uh, yeah, I guess you could call it that.
Oh?
Well, I think that one looks good on you, too!
Hey, by the way, what is going on with that Christmas party?
You know, Shu's idea...
Looks like it is a go for tomorrow!
We are inviting people from our class, and we will all be there, too.
Today we are getting gifts for the grab bag.
Would you mind if I came, too?
Mother
Here.
The reservation for your company dinner and all the schedule adjustments are done!
Please give me my next task!
Oh, my, you took care of that quicker than I thought.
What on earth has gotten into you?
Your work has been stellar the last few days.
Well, not that you have not been a godsend.
It looks like I will have to add a generous tip to your paycheck!
I am getting paid?
Of course you are.
Those who work must be compensated.
It is a rule of society.
Also...
I have already made that hotel reservation for you.
You have passed.
I am sure it will be fine, entrusting her to you.
As a mother, I do not know if it is appropriate to say this,
but go on and have as much fun as high school kids should!
I do not want a paycheck.
Or the hotel room, needless to say.
But...
I do have one favor to ask of you.
If I work extra hard,
and that gives you some extra time tomorrow on Christmas Eve,
do you think you can go see Chitoge?
What are you talking about...?
I know you can do it!
If I keep up this pace and work to death, I can open up some time for you!
Is not that right?
Well, I suppose...
Can you go or cannot you?
Which is it?
Well, of course it is a possibility, but...
That is all I need to hear.
I am getting back to work.
Oh, hey - wait!
It could be that I am only butting in needlessly.
Same as the other day - it is like I will end up hurting her.
But...
I cannot leave things like this... that would be too cruel to poor Chitoge!
I do not know if it will fix things between them if they meet up,
but I want to do whatever I can for her, at least!
All the work I was supposed to do this month...
It is all right here.
And judging by your recent tendencies,
everything you might need as gifts for your clients...
I have gone out and purchased them all.
My, you do amaze me.
I have done everything that I possibly could.
Ms. Hana...
I am asking you now!
Please go see her!
Oh, I will not be going.
Not me.
Why not?!
If it is a matter of time, you have got that!
Well, then, at least just a second!
Just give her this!
What is that?
It is a present.
I went out and bought it.
There is a scarf inside.
Please give it to her!
Not another one.
Did not I tell you there was no need?
But that is not really up to you, is it, Ms. Hana?
I am telling you, you are overstepping!
You are sticking your nose into other families' business way too much.
Ms. Hana, do not you want to see her?
Well, it is not really as if I do not...
I see...
Is that it, then?
So you never had the slightest interest in Chitoge from the start, huh?
If you have opened up my schedule, then that is convenient for me.
All I have to do is book another appointment.
Why, you...
Enough is enough!
I did get her something,
but it seems I will not get a chance to give it to her this year, either.
Uh, Ms. Hana... is that...
It is a present.
For Christmas.
They have just been piling up for the last ten years.
Every single year, I get her one,
and then end up not being able to give it to her, see.
Ms. Hana, did you just eat...
Oh, this?
This is just a chocolate cigarette.
Did not you used to eat these as a child?
As for real cigarettes,
once I became pregnant with Chitoge, I quit cold turkey.
Wh-What the...?
Uh...
But I thought you did not have any interest in Chitoge?
Why would you think that?
Well, because...
You forgot all about Chitoge's ribbon,
and you always forget how old she is.
Of course I would never forget!
That is the ribbon I gave her, you know!
Wh-Whaaat did you say?!
Well, come on,
that girl's still wearing that cheap ribbon I gave her ten years ago!
When I am sure she can find something that would become her more.
As for her age, of course I remember!
It is just that... when I am with her, I get so nervous...
that I start out by asking her age.
No, no, no!
That will only backfire on you!
Is not she an amazing girl?
I told you this before, did not I?
If you have the ability, it is your duty to exercise it.
That girl is gifted with marvelous abilities.
If she put her mind to it, she could far surpass both Adelt and myself.
Not only that, but she is a beauty, just like me.
So like me...
I have raised her quite strictly.
But I am sure I was far too strict.
Before I knew it, she stopped calling me Mom.
I am sure she must really hate me now.
Is that why you came up with the idea of sending us to a hotel on Christmas Eve?
That is because I thought that would make her happier.
Am I wrong?
This woman...
Dammit, so that was it, huh?
I finally see it now!
Ms. Hana?
You moron!
Ouch!
Ouch!
Why, you...
How dare you do such a thing to me...
You have got it wrong on the most basic level!
She does not hate you at all!
She is needed you all this time!
Even now!
She was totally looking forward to spending Christmas Eve with you!
Even now, except when she is with you,
she still calls you Mom, you know!
Please, go see her!
You can still make it!
But...
I am supposed to head to the YOU.S. after this today.
What should I do?
Then... how much time do you have?
Three hours before my flight takes off.
Crap, that is cutting it close!
Ms. Hana, once you have finished getting ready for your trip,
please wait at that five-star suite!
And I will bring Chitoge to you!
But...
Damn,
here I was, thinking Ms. Hana was a wizard at her job...
but other than that, she is nothing but an airhead!
I guess the apple does not fall too far from the tree!
Look, look outside!
It is snowing!
Oh, yeah?
It is a white Christmas!
I bet something wonderful's in store for us this year.
Young Mistress, are not you cold standing there?
Please come over here.
By the way, when will Master Raku be arriving?
Oh, right, I am sure he will be here soon.
Hey, Mom!
I want a ribbon just like this!
All right, you can have one.
Take good care of it, okay?
I wonder when things got like this between us?
I used to be able to talk to her, just like that...
Is it always going to be like this?
Mom and me...
Never...
Chitoge!
Chitoge!
What, what, what?
Chitoge, are you there?
Raku?
OOOh!
Master Raku!
What are you doing here?
Are not you supposed to be with my mom?
No time to explain!
Just come with me, all right?
Hey...
Hold up a second!
This is so sudden!
At least tell me where!
All right, then...
To a five-star hotel suite!
Ms. Hana Kirisaki
This is a boarding time change notification.
As the snow is predicted to become heavier, the charter flight you have reserved will be leaving earlier than scheduled.
Please be sure to be on time.
It is no good, Ichijo!
The heavy snow up north is causing a major traffic jam.
This car is not going anywhere!
Are you serious?
Not at a time like this...
Hey, hold up a second!
Tell me what is going on!
My bad!
I promise to bring it back right away!
Hey!
That hotel you mentioned...
it is the one Mom was talking about, right?
No way am I going!
Why would I go with you?!
Ms. Hana is waiting for you there!
I am taking you to see her, so just shut your mouth and sit there!
Mom's there?
Why?
Well, Ms. Hana...
Sure, she said a lot of things that could be taken the wrong way,
and I would not blame you if you did not believe me, but...
The truth is, she really, really cares about you!
No way...
No way could that be...
No way could I ever believe that!
Believe it!
For once in your life, why do not you just...
Trust in me!
She is gone?
Yes.
She said her flight was leaving early because of the snow.
The airport, then!
Come on, hurry!
Okay!
The snow is intensifying.
Please hurry.
If you were to miss this meeting,
it will mean a loss of several billion yen for our company.
We are not going to make...
It is not too late!
Please ditch that appointment, Ms. Hana!
Little boy...
Thank you, little boy.
But that is enough, all right?
It made me happy to hear how Chitoge feels about me,
but... I have got to go.
Please give her my regards, will you?
There you go, blaming it on your work...
The truth is, you are just scared, are not you?!
A woman your age, what are you doing running away?!
Which is more important, your work, or her?
I want you to think long and hard about that!
Mom...
Please...
Mom!
Mom?
Chitoge...
Do you...
Do you still love your mom?
I do... love you...
Even though you are scary...
And I never get to see you,
and even when you are with me, all you do is yell at me...
And even though you never even look at me...
And I have no idea what you are thinking...
And did I mention that I am terrified of you?
But I still love you!
Chitoge!
Chitoge!
Mom!
What the heck...
Just as I thought, they are two of a kind.
I am sorry!
I am so sorry, Chitoge!
Mom!
Mom!
Ms. Hana?
It is too cold for you to have a long heart-to-heart here.
I am going to head back to the office,
and deal with the aftermath as best I can,
so you go on to the hotel
and spend a relaxing Christmas Eve with her, all right?
You need to dial down the heroics, little boy.
Come on, you can make an exception.
For today...
Come to think of it,
I still have not given you your Christmas present, have I?
Here you go.
A new ribbon - I picked it out for you!
It does make me very happy to know that you treasure that ribbon.
But you are a girl, after all...
Thank you, Mom.
But...
I still want to go on treasuring this one.
Since this one brings back so many memories.
I see.
I am sure that will make that boy very happy as well.
Raku?
Why?
What, have you forgotten?
That boy is the reason you started wearing that ribbon, you know.
Ten years ago, you and that boy spent a summer playing together, see,
and there was a girl wearing a ribbon like that
in one of the picture books you adored at the time.
And that boy said to you, I bet this ribbon would look good on you.
And you rushed over to pester me for one.
Do not you remember?
He said that?
Why do not you go to him?
Chitoge...
It was all thanks to that boy that I got to have this long talk with you.
He is your boyfriend, is not he?
You should go to him.
Okay.
If you sleep here, you will catch a cold.
Stupid bean sprout...
There, now...
Thank you, Raku.
Thank you, little boy.
I really owe you one.
I never thought you would help me out this much, both in business and in private.
Still, to think that
I would be reunited like this with that little boy who played with Chitoge ten years ago...
It really is a strange twist of fate, is not it?
Ms. Hana, you were there, too, ten years ago?
Well, just for a few days.
But I remember you very well.
Um... Ms. Hana...
Does this locket look at all familiar to you?
There is something about that time that I want to remember.
But I just cannot seem to recall it.
I do not think I can help you with that.
Sorry.
I see.
Little boy,
come here for a second.
Okay.
Listen... I hear you and Chitoge are just pretending to be dating, are not you?
Ms. Hana... you knew all along?
Of course I did.
Well, not from the start, but still...
Then you should have told us.
Now I feel stupid for going all-out to fake it!
I am starting to feel embarrassed.
Faking it, eh?
If I work extra hard, do you think you can go see Chitoge?
I am asking you now!
Please go see her!
Is this really nothing but a sham, I wonder?
Are your feelings for that girl really nothing more than a sham?
All right, then - please look after my daughter.
After Chitoge and I saw Ms. Hana off,
I got a call from Shu.
Apparently, they were under the impression
that Chitoge and I had spent the night in a hotel suite,
and wanting to know what we would been up to, they interrogated us.
Though we did manage to straighten them out,
it ended up being a hell of a Christmas.
Hey, now I remember.
That locket...
It is the one that came out in Chitoge's picture book.
Oh, well, till the next time I see him.
I wonder how many years will go by before we meet again?
What?
You are heading over now?
The Christmas party ended hours ago!
Oh, Ruri, telling me the trains were not running... do not give me that!
You were really asleep till now, right?
We really had our hands full, you know.
Yes...
I really am glad that it was a misunderstanding.
What?
Oh, that is okay, no need for apologies!
You use that present yourself, all right?
No, I do not want it!
